headline: If I Could Invest $1,000 In Any Vanguard ETF, It Would Undoubtedly Be This One
summary: Investing in the S&P 500 offers instant diversification, exposure to blue chip stocks, and proven historical results.  The Vanguard S&P 500 ETF is one of the cheapest exchange-traded funds on the stock market.  Investing in ETFs allows investors to achieve instant diversification in many cases, removes much of the guesswork from investing, and reduces the risk associated with investing in individual stocks.
